hr.vvg.java.vjezbe.utilities

Class Operations

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.vvg.java.vjezbe.utilities.Operations

  • public class Operations
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains operations which simulate a Library Handles adding new Publications, Book and Magazine, new Member input, sorting Publication list, printing out available Languages and PublicationTypes and selection of Publication to execute Loan Created by marko on 3/28/15.

      • addPublication

        public static boolean addPublication(Publication pub,
                                     Library<Publication> library)
        checks if there's a duplicate publication on the list after a new publication has been entered add publication to the list if there's no duplicate
        Parameters:
        pub - publication to add to publicationList
        library - a library object containing a list of by now added publications
        Returns:
        true if added false if duplicate found
